title: How to dispose off Taweez or Amulets? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: car from bangladesh a man gave him something to hang on the wall to prevent evil eye black magic etc so it's a sort of a uh taoise in in large size so he did this and then he figured out that this is haram so he threw it from the window did he do the right thing the answer is no he should have burnt it with fire while reciting the last three but as he disposed of it without uh doing this i hope there is nothing wrong in that insha allah
